body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Roger Lewis. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Roger. My name is Susan Moore. I'm interested in learning more about your latest car models.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Susan. Can you tell me what specific features you're looking for in a car?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for something fuel-efficient with advanced safety features.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds great. We have several models that might fit your needs. For our records, could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - zero one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Susan. Can I also have your email address so I can send you detailed information about our models?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is susan.moore at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. I'll email you our latest brochure and special offers. If you have any more questions, feel free to email or call us anytime.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Roger. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Susan. Thank you for choosing Vincenzo's Benzos. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Roger Lewis and the customer's name is Susan Moore.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
